testcase.classname: As a user of the application i want to order a product
testcase.name: ordering a product
testcase.system-out: Given user is successfully naviaged to "https://jpetstore.aspectran.com/catalog/".passed When user select a product in homepage.....................................passed And user select a produuct id...............................................passed When user adds product to cart..............................................passed And user update quantity and click on checkout..............................passed And user enters userName and Password.......................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed When user enters payment and shipinng deatils...............................passed Then user can verify order submitted........................................passed And user can logout from the application....................................passed
